nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (sum(syntheticsFailedCheckCount) + sum(syntheticsSuccessCheckCount)) AS 'Synthetic Check Usage' FROM NrDailyUsage WHERE productLine = 'Synthetics' and syntheticsTypeLabel != 'Ping' SINCE 1 month ago

widgets.title: Number of checks a customer runs on browser type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Synthetics WHERE jobType != 'SIMPLE' AND isPrivateLocation IS FALSE AND scriptLanguage IS NULL AND account = XXXXXX
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck FACET monitorName LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Number of each browser type a customer has

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(monitorId) FROM Synthetics WHERE jobType != 'SIMPLE' AND isPrivateLocation IS FALSE AND scriptLanguage IS NULL AND account = XXXXXX

widgets.title: Weekly report of checks over custom amount of time

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration), apdex(duration, t:), percentage(count(*), WHERE result='SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck FACET dateOf(timestamp) SINCE 1 week ago
